properties.entry: SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, MEMBER_NO FROM "COMMENT" WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, MEMBER_NO FROM "COMMENT" LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, MEMBER_NO FROM "COMMENT" WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
